Text:
.MKV file...NOT a DVD-R.  The English and Portuguese subs are included in SEPARATE .srt files.  Nordic soft-subs are already integrated into the file. Good luck retaining the 5.1 surround sound in any (very difficult) attempts at conversion into a soft-sub DVD format.

Couldn't ANYBODY put out an English soft-subbed DVD-R format of this film?  Must not be enough interest, I guess.

What a mess. One non-english movie and you got hardcoded subs all over and the rest are of the torrents have confusing information. So is this the DVD or bluray release, and does it indeed have nordic subtitles?
